summary.span: 提供 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) XAML 工具的支援。

span.span: Provides support for Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) XAML tooling.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 支援此命名空間中的類別[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]基礎結構並不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The classes in this namespace support the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] infrastructure and are not intended to be used directly from your code.
